lead_paragraph: Black workers and people with disabilities are among the groups being disproportionately subject to job cuts in New York City’s Finance Department, a labor organization contends.
snippet: Black workers and people with disabilities are among the groups being disproportionately subject to job cuts in New York City’s Finance Department, a labor organization contends.

headline.main: City Layoffs Are Hurting Minorities, Union Says
headline.seo: New York City Job Cuts Hurt Minorities, Union Says
headline.print_headline: City Layoffs Are Hurting Minorities, Union Says
